T02TD2861E:199b-1: sam kshipta aa mo gha p'a sha s'a dha nam /
T02TD2861E:199b-3: don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa /
T02TD2861E:199b-4: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2861E:199b-5: mgon po hr'i: yig las byung zhing //
T02TD2861E:199b-6: thugs ni thugs rje yis brlan pa //
T02TD2861E:199b-7: don yod zhags pa zhes bya ba'i //
T02TD2861E:199b-9: sdig pa bshags sogs byas nas ni //
T02TD2861E:199b-10: stong pa nyid sogs mthar thug pas /
T02TD2861E:199b-11: skad cig rnam pas rje btsun ni //
T02TD2861E:199b-12: ji lta'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2861E:199b-13: sna tshogs chu skyes steng bzhengs nas //
T02TD2861E:199b-14: zhal gcig pa la phyag brgyad pa //
T02TD2861E:199b-15: mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin dang //
T02TD2861E:199b-16: zhags pa bgrang phreng rab mdzes g-yas //
T02TD2861E:199b-17: dbyug pa rtse gsum glegs bam dang //
T02TD2861E:199b-19: dka' thub chas 'dzin mdzad pa yis //
T02TD2861E:199b-20: stag gi pags pas smad dkris pa //
T02TD2861E:199b-21: g-yas g-yon nor bzangs rta mgrin dang //
T02TD2861E:199b-22: sgrol ma khro gnyer can yang ngo //
T02TD2861E:199b-23: mgon po yan lag kun dkar po //
T02TD2861E:199b-24: rab dkar na bzas rnam par spras //
T02TD2861E:199b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba //
T02TD2861E:199b-27: 'od dpag med dmar cod pan can //
T02TD2861E:199b-28: sems can don mdzad pa la brtson //
T02TD2861E:199b-29: de ltar bsgom par byas nas ni //
T02TD2861E:199b-30: gsang sngags bzlas pas bdud 'byer ro /
T02TD2861E:199b-31: aom aa mo gha pa' sha tr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2861E:199b-32: don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa //
T02TD2861E:199b-33: kha che panti ta chen po sh'a kya shr'i bha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD2861E:199b-34: / khyod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba /
T02TD2861E:199b-35: drang srong srin po ri rab sgyur ro /
